The next day, dad comes home from work to find johnny and grandma going at in the living room, dad walks in and screams "WHAT THE HELL IS GOING ON HERE?"
johnny looks up at dad and says, "It's not so funny when it's your mom, huh?"

topics.body: Someguy111 just loves to stick his fingers in his ears. He still said that the GMO safety studies I cited could be biased because they were industry-funded, when in fact the studies I cited had no funding from the industry at all.
